articles.description: NASA's Landsat 8 satellite reveals stunning images of the 6,900-year-old Luna crater in Gujarat, India, confirming its extraterrestrial origins through rare mineral findings. Spanning 1.8 kilometers in diameter, the crater's distinct features and surrounding …

articles.title: Lok Sabha polls: Election Commission reschedules polling in J&K's Anantnag-Rajouri, voting on May 25 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Election Commission of India on Tuesday rescheduled polling for the Lok Sabha election in Jammu and Kashmir's Anantnag-Rajouri seat from May 7 to May 25. | Latest News India
articles.content:
The Election Commission of India on Tuesday rescheduled polling for the Lok Sabha election in Jammu and Kashmir's Anantnag-Rajouri seat from May 7 to May 25.

articles.title: Coca-Cola gains $293 million from sale of some bottling operations | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The beverage major remains “bullish” on the long-term prospects of the country where it sells several brands including Coca-Cola, Sprite, and Minute Maid. The management expects the company to have a “strong” year in India.
